org.ldaptive.provider.jndi
Class JndiUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.ldaptive.provider.jndi.JndiUtil

public class JndiUtil
extends Object

Provides methods for converting between JNDI specific objects and ldaptive specific objects.

Version:
$Revision: 2198 $ $Date: 2012-01-04 16:02:09 -0500 (Wed, 04 Jan 2012) $
Author:
Middleware Services

throwOperationException

public static void throwOperationException(ResultCode[] operationRetryResultCodes,
                                           NamingException e,
                                           ResponseControl[] respControls)
                                    throws LdapException
Determines whether to throw operation exception or ldap exception. If operation exception is thrown, the operation will be retried. Otherwise the exception is propagated out.

Parameters:
operationRetryResultCodes - to compare result code against
e - naming exception to examine
respControls - response controls
Throws:
OperationException - if the operation should be retried
LdapException - to propagate the exception out

processResponseControls

public static ResponseControl[] processResponseControls(ControlProcessor<Control> processor,
                                                        RequestControl[] requestControls,
                                                        LdapContext ctx)
Retrieves the response controls from the supplied context and processes them with the supplied control processor. Logs a warning if controls cannot be retrieved.

Parameters:
processor - control processor
requestControls - that produced this response
ctx - to get controls from
Returns:
response controls
